/**
 * Module exports.
 */

module.exports = bufferConcat

/**
 * Concatenate an array of Buffers.
 */

function bufferConcat(bufs) {
  var length = 0

  for (var i = 0, len = bufs.length; i < len; i++) {
    length += bufs[i].length
  }

  var buf = new Buffer(length)
  var pos = 0

  for (var i = 0, len = bufs.length; i < len; i++) {
    bufs[i].copy(buf, pos)
    pos += bufs[i].length
  }

  return buf
}
